name: Sweet Island - Donut Adventure
description:
Super addictive casual game.Easy to play; hard to become a
master.

Fantastic 2D game where you control a small cool character who moves vertically in a moving scenario. Familiar and comical theme.Clean and stylized art-work.Super innovative never seen controls: tap to progress; slide to move sideways

[Easy Tap to Achieve Goals]
Move over the floor tiles before you die. It seems easy but it’s not: tap to progress; slide to move sideways.

[Meet Sweet and Magic Cakes]
Travel around endless worlds full of magic and fun with outstanding art-works for every target.
Achieve and meet our super cool characters:
from a chocolate cake to a burger or a muffin.
Enjoy them all!


For more details, please check our Facebook page:
https://www.facebook.com/SoulGameFans
